Imports

compiletimeflags

Vars

StackSize = if (
  0 < MaxAvailableMemory): min(4194304) do:
  var res: int
  setBit(res, fastLog2(MaxAvailableMemory - 1))
  res else: 4194304
Source   Edit

proc retrieveAllocatorDataFromSigsegv(segvAddress: pointer): pointer {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Complexity O(n), but not important at this point, because SIGSEGV is not recoeverable Maybe unsafe, GC might be triggered between SIGSEGV and signal handler Source   Edit
